chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Device is damaged. I request a discount / refund, otherwise I'll unfortunately have to return the device. I suggest 10% of the purchase price and look forward to hearing from you. You can reach me by phone at 01777780776.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

the customer isn't happy with the device he received, says it doesn't match the quality he bought it for and asks for a 10 per cent discount on the price he paid.

Do you agree?

I look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,
Joele from Back Market

Dear Backcare, kindly relay the following message to the customer. 

We are very sorry to hear about this issue. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 43 euros commercial gesture instead? 
You could contribute significantly in reducing the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device. 
This would definitely be a big help to our eco-friendly efforts to save our environment.

Thank you.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has accepted the 43 euros commercial gesture.

I'll proceed with the request for reimbursement of the agreed amount.

Thank you.

Kind regards,
Joele Back Market customer Care
